name: CronUpkeepFactory
description: The CronUpkeepFactory contract. This contract serves as a delegate for all instances of CronUpkeep. Those contracts delegate their checkUpkeep calls onto this contract. Utilizing this pattern reduces the size of the CronUpkeep contracts.

eventDecorators.name: NewCronUpkeepCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a collateral factor is changed by admin.

functionDecorators.name: cronDelegateAddress
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of the delegate contract.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the delegate contract.

functionDecorators.name: newCronUpkeep
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new CronUpkeep contract, with msg.sender as the owner.
